description:
11.121 hwdownload
Download hardware frames to system memory.

The input must be in hardware frames, and the output a non-hardware format.
Not all formats will be supported on the output - it may be necessary to insert
an additional format filter immediately following in the graph to get
the output in a supported format.
name: hwdownload
source:
11.121 hwdownload

Download hardware frames to system memory.

The input must be in hardware frames, and the output a non-hardware format. Not all formats will be supported on the output - it may be necessary to insert an additional format filter immediately following in the graph to get the output in a supported format.
